entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:42 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 12:53 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -13.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
